price: 14. Si (l’ennemi) avait pénétré dans (la ville) par tous les côtés et qu’il les ait exhortés à apostasier, ils auraient obtempéré sans trop d’hésitation.
arabic: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaw dukhilat ʿalayhim min aqṭārihā thumma su-ilū al-fit'nata laātawhā wamā talabbathū bihā illā yasīran
